sentences.en: Are you married or single?
sentences.cn: 你是已婚还是单身？

sentences.en: He married Miss Vancouver in 1963, or whenever it was.
sentences.cn: 他好像在1963年还是什么时候娶了当时的温哥华小姐。

sentences.en: He was surprised they had married — they had seemed so different.
sentences.cn: 他俩居然结婚了——这让他非常惊讶，因为他们实在是太不一样了。

sentences.en: I didn't want to impose myself on my married friends.
sentences.cn: 我不想打扰自己已婚的朋友。

sentences.en: I lived there once myself, before I got married.
sentences.cn: 我结婚前曾独自在那儿住过。

sentences.en: I thought he would change after we got married.
sentences.cn: 我原以为我们结婚后他会改变的。

sentences.en: I'm pretty sure they slept together before they were married.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定他们结婚之前就上过床了。

sentences.en: In July 1957, we were married in New York.
sentences.cn: 我们于1957年7月在纽约举行了婚礼。

sentences.en: Married life was not as idyllic as he had imagined.
sentences.cn: 婚姻生活并不像他想象的那么浪漫美好。

sentences.en: Married men earn 70 percent more than single men.
sentences.cn: 已婚男子比单身男子多挣70%。

sentences.en: Nicole is married to my brother.
sentences.cn: 妮科尔嫁给了我的弟弟。

sentences.en: She enjoys the material comforts married life has brought her.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢婚姻生活带给她的物质享受。

sentences.en: So, how do you like married life ?
sentences.cn: 那么，你觉得婚后生活怎么样？

sentences.en: The couple married in the Caribbean to avoid a media circus.
sentences.cn: 为了摆脱媒体的关注，这对新人在加勒比喜结连理。

sentences.en: There has been a lot of talk about me getting married.
sentences.cn: 有很多传言说我要结婚了。

sentences.en: They had met by chance at university and finished up getting married.
sentences.cn: 他们在大学偶遇，最后结了婚。

sentences.en: They were married with all the trimmings, soon after graduation.
sentences.cn: 他们毕业后不久就大操大办地结婚了。

sentences.en: They’ve been married for eight years.
sentences.cn: 他们已经结婚八年了。

sentences.en: We got married when I was 30 for all the wrong reasons.
sentences.cn: 由于种种阴差阳错，我30岁时我们结了婚。

sentences.en: We’re getting married (= marrying ) next month.
sentences.cn: 我们下个月结婚。

sentences.en: When she first came to London, she was newly married and out of work.
sentences.cn: 她初到伦敦时刚结婚，而且没有工作。

sentences.en: Why can't I remember the exact year we married?
sentences.cn: 为什么我记不起我们结婚的准确年份了？

words.tran_cn: 结婚；婚姻生活；密切结合，合并

trans.tran_cn: 已婚的，与…结为夫妻的，婚姻的
trans.tran_en: having a husband or a wife

trans.tran_cn: （使）结婚( marry的过去式)，娶，嫁，紧密结合的
